name: Dream Aether
description:
This experience was made in a week for C.H.A.I.N. It has been adapted as an isolated solo experience but we recommend you make sure to check out the C.H.A.I.N as well for the full context.

 

Dive deeper and deeper into dreams in this short musical experience.

KeyboardWASD
Movement DirectionShiftBoostSpacebarReset Position        GamepadLeft JoystickMovement DirectionBottom Face ButtonBoostTop Face ButtonReset Position

Follow us on itch.io to get updated with the latest projects we are working on.

Follow us on twitter at: @NegativeEntity

Featuring music produced by Deejay Astral Soundcloud
